title: Public Reckoning Unleashed
outcome: In response to public outrage and unresolved grief, the Council announces a citywide tribunal where any citizen—active or vanished—can testify to BCI injustices. The process uncovers not just the stories of disappeared citizens, but exposes deep-seated betrayals and secret protocols within Council ranks. Districts erupt with raw, sometimes chaotic debates as forgotten neighborhood feuds and hidden loyalties resurface. The tribunal splits both citizens and the Council itself, forcing new alliances and moral confrontations that threaten to destabilize Stenograd's social fabric.

events.description: Council opens registration for a citywide public tribunal on BCI injustices, inviting testimony from all citizens, including those recently re-identified from the vanished population.
Emotional testimonies flood in, including stories of disappearances, manipulated scores, and public admissions of betrayal between neighbors.
Council faction tensions rise as previously secret protocols are revealed through public evidence, implicating both Directorate and Innovators in past abuses.
Districts erupt in heated local assemblies, with some regions reconciling through shared governance but others descending into rivalry and blame.
The tribunal concludes with a divided Council and emboldened citizen groups calling for a complete overhaul of city leadership and the end of the BCI as it exists.
